releaseNotes.en: Major stability and UX update: Rules now take effect immediately without restart, fixed update check focus issues, completed full i18n support (EN/ZH), and refined the context action icon library.
releaseNotes.zh-Hans: 重大稳定性与体验更新：规则变更现已支持实时生效无需重启，修复了检查更新时的窗口失焦问题，补全了全量国际化支持，并精选了 24 个高价值开发图标库。
